name: ScratchiMouse
description:
The game developed during Global Game Jam 2015 .  It was my first participation in game jam. Developed for participant of my computer club in ILAN. The Israeli Foundation for Handicapped Children.  For practicing use of arrow keys. I made minor after jam improvements to the graphics.

Page of the game on Global Game Jam site.
https://globalgamejam.org/2015/games/scratchimause
